long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JobApplicationTrakr is a Chrome extension designed to streamline your job search process on websites like LinkedIn, Glassdoor, and Indeed. This tool automatically scrapes job details such as job title, company name, and posting URL, and saves them to your Google Drive. This allows you to easily track and manage your job applications in one place, ensuring you never miss an opportunity. Key features include:
- Automatic job detail extraction
- Google Drive integration for easy access and management
- Support for LinkedIn, Glassdoor, and Indeed
- User-friendly interface and seamless operation
Install JobApplicationTrakr today and take control of your job search!
